title: Tips for Staying Safe at the Polls
itunes:title: Tips for Staying Safe at the Polls
description:
Dr. Peter Alperin, Vice President at Doximity, discusses the latest coronavirus news and how voters can protect themselves when heading to the polls. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne walks through China stopping Jack Ma’s $35 billion Ant IPO from going ahead. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy compare Trump's and Biden's plans for the economy. Bloomberg Associates Principal Katherine Oliver and Milan Deputy Mayor Roberta Cocco talk about digital city tools and the innovative ways leading city governments are embracing technology. And we Drive to the Close with Kathy Boyle, President at Chaplin Hill Advisors.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
